response.overview: "Twilight" star Robert Pattinson plays the lead role of young detective Eric Maddux, who, unlike his newly graduated colleagues, has the knowledge and skills to make him one of the best in the profession. Eric has a unique ability to decipher complex codes and extract important information from seemingly unrelated events. His latest assignment is to discover the location of one of the world's most wanted men - Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein. In order to successfully cope with the mission, the young scout will be forced to oppose his superiors and trust only his knowledge and flair. The closer Eric gets to the truth, the more dangerous and unpredictable his mission becomes.
response.title: Addicted to Violence
